para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: After installation of the machine is completed, perform a test run before starting normal operation.
In the test run, be sure to follow the information in "SAFETY", and check that the items below operate normally.

table.style: border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:4px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.text: Perform a test run according to the Instruction Manual. Failure to observe the proper procedure can result in a serious accident.

table.style: border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.text: After installation, use the manual pulse generator to slowly turn each axis to perform breaking-in operation so that the lubricant is spread over the X-axis, Y-axis, and Z-axis. There may not be enough lubricating oil supplied to the components, so if the axes are suddenly moved at high speeds, the seals and guideways can be damaged.
